      This spell reduces the opponent's health by half
      Parameters:

    • defend

      public void defend​(Character other)
      defend has a 75% chance of succeeding, in which case they are invincible and charge up their attack damage the other 25% chance is for them to stumble and be vulnerable for a turn
      Parameters:
      other - other character

    • modifyHealth

      public void modifyHealth​(int modifier)
      modify health changes a characters health by the modified amount
      Parameters:
      modifier - modifier amount to change health cannot go below 0 or over maxhealth

    • modifyAttack

      public void modifyAttack​(int modifier)

      Parameters:
      modifier - the amount that you want to change base damage by

    • setTempDamageBuff

      public void setTempDamageBuff​(double buff)
      Set the temporary damage buffer. This is a multiplicative factor which will modify the damage for the next attack made by this Character. After the next attack, it will get reset back to 1.0
      Parameters:
      buff - the multiplicative factor for the next attack's damage.

    • getTempDamageBuff

      public double getTempDamageBuff()
      gets the damage buff modifiers
      Returns:
      the current damage buff of the character

      obtain item

    • useItem

      public void useItem​(Character owner, Character other)
      Use an item
      Parameters:
      owner - character to consume the item
      other - can be used if the item effects a second character

    • hasItems

      public boolean hasItems()
      checks if character has items
      Returns:
      returns false if character has no item
